name: 3D Police Racing
description: 3D Police Racing - Race Around Track Avoiding Black Flags and Collecting Blue and Red Flags. Race Avoiding Penalties. How Fast Can You Complete Circuit? 7 Dashboard Clocks Show Stats. Shows Last Lap Time. Control to Move Left and Right. Up Control to Accelerate. Down Control to Reverse. New: Stunt Jumps Through Hoops of Fire. Rival Police Cars on the Attack. FREE Version - New Soundtrack - Added Jumps! New: Rival Police Cars on the Attack. New: Stunt Jumps Through Hoops of Fire. New: Fun Soundtrack. FREE Version. *****Please Rate***** •
